mapper.select: SELECT id, name, phone, open_id AS openId, nick_name AS nickName, head_cover AS headCover, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(id) FROM d_customer_group WHERE customer_id = d_customer.id GROUP BY customer_id) AS customerGroupIds FROM WHERE id = #{id} OR open_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, name, phone, open_id, nick_name, head_cover, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{openId}, #{nickName}, #{headCover}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_date = NOW() ,updater = #{updater} ,update_ip = #{updateIp} ,name = VALUES(name)
